basic.Target Organism: Gram-positive bacteria:Bacillus megaterium (MIC=1.2-2.5 µM), Bacillus subtilis (MIC>40 µM), Micrococcus luteus (MIC=1.2-2.5 µM), Staphylococcus aureus (MIC=2.5-5 µM).Gram-negative bacteria:Enterobacter asbriae (MIC>40 µM), Escherichia coli (MIC>40 µM), Pseudomonas aeruginosa (MIC>40 µM), Serratia marcescens (MIC>40 µM), Xenorhabdus japonicus (MIC>40 µM).
